lead_paragraph: The operator is shutting off the internet browsers because they have drawn people who linger for hours, sometimes drinking, using drugs or watching pornography.

headline.print_headline: Unsavory Side of Free Wi-Fi Spurs Retreat
headline.main: Free Wi-Fi Kiosks Were to Aid New Yorkers. An Unsavory Side Has Spurred a Retreat.

snippet: The operator is shutting off the internet browsers because they have drawn people who linger for hours, sometimes drinking, using drugs or watching pornography....
abstract: LinkNYC network announces that it will shut off free internet browsers on Wi-Fi kiosks it operates in New York City in response to complaints, but will leave untouched other functions kiosks provide; complaints focused on how kiosks attracted homeless people and other idle users who lingered for hours, often watching pornography on street.
